body:
Hey guys, I just uploaded a video showing how to build a really good house in Minecraft!

Just saying now, this video is very complicated, and may be too much for you guys to handle.
This video will show you how to become a pro in building houses.
Enjoy!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hc382RRH-9Y

title: How To Build A House Like A Pro (Video)

replies.body: I think I missed a step or two

replies.body:
